subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: After nearly 80 years of watching the Ryder Cup crisscross the Atlantic Ocean but never hitting Ireland, some 25,000 fans passed through the gates on Tuesday just for the opening warm-up session.
snippet: After nearly 80 years of watching the Ryder Cup crisscross the Atlantic Ocean but never hitting Ireland, some 25,000 fans passed through the gates on Tuesday just for the opening warm-up session.
